link_desc:
This small python daemon program enable monitoring through SMTP traps, a variant of SNMP traps. Based on ideas from this:

https://support.zabbix.com/browse/ZBXNEXT-3039

And also found in this discussion :

https://www.zabbix.com/forum/showthread.php?p=186838

It is used also in the context of Veeam VBR monitoring but it is very generical and can be used to all kind of usage. It uses Zabbix trapper.

It uses regular expression that have to be entered in a specific file in /etc/zabbix/zbxsmtptrap.ini

All documentation is within Github:

https://github.com/sibiodev/zbxsmtptrap
author: Raynald de Lahondès
